sect1.title: AND
sect1.para: Return the logical and of the the two boolean arguments.

sect2.title: Arguments
sect2.para: Exactly two arguments are required, and they must evaluate to Booleans.

sect2.title: Returns
sect2.para: Returns the logical and of the two argument expressions.

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: make “foo and true true ; foo = true make “foo and true false ; foo = false make “foo false make “bar and :foo true ; bar = false
